Articles.Content:
The Ursa I is a 1.75 meter rocket carrying the Antares CM/SM tested and capable of reaching minmus and returning 8)

Addons Required

-Nova Punch V1.2 Alpha

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4180.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4180.0)

-KW Rocketry for SRBs

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=2680.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=2680.0)

-Rocketco Soyuz munar lander for capsule decoupler

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4429.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4429.0)
